questions.question_text: Bhagwānnā bhaktanā drohe karīne jevu ā jīvnu _____ thây chhe ne e jīvne kașht thāy chhe tevu koī _____ karīne nathī thatu.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut states that harming Bhagwan's devotees leads to suffering, worse than any sin.

questions.question_text: Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne droh na karavo.
questions.explanation: This quote emphasizes avoiding disrespect towards Bhagwan's devotees.

questions.question_text: Ane Bhagwānnā bhaktanī mane, vachane, dehe karīne je _____ banī āve ne tene karīne jevu ā jīvnu rūdu thây chhe ne e jīvne _____ thây chhe tevu bīje koī sādhane karīne nathī thatu...
questions.explanation: Serving Bhagwan's devotees brings happiness that no other means can provide.

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnā bhaktanā drohe karīne jevu ā jīvnu bhūndu thây chhe ne e jīvne kașht thāy chhe tevu koī pāpe karīne nathī thatu; ane Bhagwānnā bhaktanī mane, vachane, dehe karīne je sevā banī āve ne tene karīne jevu ā jīvnu rūdu thây chhe ne e jīvne sukh thây chhe tevu bīje koī sādhane karīne nathī thatu...
questions.explanation: This is the core teaching of Vachanamrut Gadhada I-40 regarding devotees.

questions.question_text: Māte jene dehe karīne param _____ thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne droh na _____.
questions.explanation: The Vachanamrut emphasizes that avoiding disrespect towards devotees is key to happiness.

questions.question_text: … Māte jene dehe karīne param sukhiyā thavu hoy ne deh mūkyā kede pan param sukhiya thavu hoy, tene Bhagwānnā bhaktano mane, vachane, dehe karīne droh na karavo.
questions.explanation: This quote focuses on not causing pain to God's devotees through thought, word, or deed.
